name: DAXX
tag_list: hire-offshore-developer, hire-dedicated-developer, programmer-for-hire, developer-for-hire, it-recruitment, engineering-recruitment, java-developer, -net-developer, android-developer, web-developer, php-developer--iphone-developer, mobile-developer, desig
overview:
Daxx is a leading Dutch offshore IT staffing company.

Founded in 1999 in the Netherlands, we establish IT software development teams in Ukraine for our clients. With our services you get access to the best IT developers and reduce costs. You manage your team directly while we deal with such non-core issues as recruitment, HRM, pay rolling, office infrastructure and other support.

We have established dedicated client teams with over 150 developers for more than 40 clients. They work from our offices in Kiev, Kharkov and Dnepropetrovsk.

We also offer IT recruitment and relocation services in case you want to have your developers on site.

We are able to recruit experienced developers, testers, project managers, web and graphic designers from Ukraine within one month.

For the technical skills required by our clients we use our in-house competence centers located in St. Petersburg (Russia), Kiev, Kharkov and Dnepropetrovsk (Ukraine). Our experience over the last 10 years and the high educational standards in these countries ensure that we can provide you with experienced and skilled IT specialists.

Daxx is headquartered in the Netherlands and has offices in the US, the UK, Germany, Ukraine, and Russia.

Interested to learn more? Visit our website: www.daxx.com

Specialties Nearshore IT Staffing, Kennismigranten, .NET Developer, PHP developer, Java developer, Android developer, Scala developer, iOS developer, Flash, Python developer, Remote developer, IT professionals, CSS, HTML, Web designers, IT recruitment, Ruby in Rails
